title: [娱乐]Crazy Enchantments —— 80多种更多附魔[1.8-1.15]
author: qsefthuopq
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qsefthuopq 于 2020-1-17 14:13 编辑 





image.png (7.84 KB, 下载次数: 37)

下载附件

2019-7-31 15:49 上传




插件名CrazyEnchantments
作者BadBones69
兼容版本1.8-1.15

警告目前Spigotmc上的最新版为开发版，该版本可能会出现一些bug和错误，不太推荐在运行中的服务器使用。
如果你遇到了问题请到Discord向插件作者反馈
如果你的服务端版本为1.8-1.12，你可以在这里下载最新的非开发版（v1.7.9.4）
更新记录v1.8 dev Build v7
修复:PlotSquared兼容性.锄头附魔出现的NPE.毁灭之镐附魔出现的NPE.NPE when the category doesn't have any enchantments.Destroy_Rate would not be disabled when the placeholder is removed.Fixed Category Max and Min levels not working.Fixed hasEnchantment using the wrong color code.NPE from when checking for CEBooks.OutOfBounds error when checking for enchantments.NPE from LostBook trying to use a sound that isn't real.Fixed LostBook sound was always disabled.Fixed broken placeholder option.Fixed LostBooks placeholder not working on the name.Fixed IllegalArgumentException from dropping air.Missing check to see if the cursor item is a crystal.BlackScrolls only gave level one enchantment books.Breaking a shulker box with Blast enchantment would clear the inventory.NPE from the enchantments.yml when trying to set an enchantment to a category that doesn't exist in the config.yml.NPE when using the /ce lostbook command and using a category that isn't a real value.Multiarrow arrows can be picked up.Fixed GKitz's option in shop GUI opening Black Smith GUI.Fixed issue with the Gkitz back button not working.

更新:ItemBuilder class has been updated and now supports a bunch of new options.
You can learn about all the options that are now available to use here: https://github.com/badbones69/Crazy-Enchantments/wiki/Items:-option-values

新增:Made factions with truces not damage each other.Prevent armor aura effects on or from vanished players.All new ItemBuilder options are now supported in these options.
GKitz Items:GKitz Item CustomizerShop ItemCustomizer


变更:Enchantment Checking is more reliable.

代码变更:Renamed ShopControler class to ShopControl.Added CEnchantment#canEnchantItem(ItemStack) method.Redid dependencies to all use maven.更新 Feudal API.更新消息classReplaced most methods with ArrayList with List优化 AuraListener class优化CommandChecker class.优化命运之骰class.优化ScrollControl class.优化尘埃class.Recoded Gkitz class a bit.Optimized the ProtectionCrystal class.
ProtectionCrystal.isSuccessfull(Player) has been deprecated and will be replaced with ProtectionCrystal.isProtectionSuccessful(Player).

Recoded how the Shop feature is handled.
New ShopManager class to help handle the shops GUI.New ShopOption class that handles all the options that will show in the Shop's GUI. This does not affect the enchantment books or lost books though.The shop is no longer built every time the GUI needs opening but instead, the ItemBuilders and slots are all stored in HashMaps in the ShopManager class. Then the items are set to the inventory when needed.

Added new method to get call enchantments in a category.
New Methods in the Category Object:
getEnchantmentList(); Gets a list of a CEnchantment object registered to that category.addEnchantment(CEnchantment enchantment); registers an enchantment to that category. This is handled automatically when an enchantment is registered.removeEnchantment(CEnchantment enchantment); This removes a registered enchantment from the category. This is handled automatically when an enchantment is unregistered.

介绍 · Introduction该插件可以为你的服务器添加80多种附魔，大大地拓展了服务器的可玩性




TIM截图20190731155329.png (16.72 KB, 下载次数: 18)

下载附件

2019-7-31 15:53 上传




三搬说明原搬运帖的汉化都已过期，旧版的配置不兼容1.13-1.14特点80多种附魔!牌子商店大量可自定义内容黑色/白色卷轴装备破碎率/附魔成功率附魔分类（默认分类：普通、稀有、传说）菜单商店附魔限制魔法尘埃工匠（用附魔装备或附魔书换取经验）铁匠（融合更多附魔的物品）尘封之书套装命运之骰
↓详情查看插件百科↓



支持插件- World Guard: 防止附魔破坏方块.- Silk Spawners - Feudal- Kingdoms+ （天使、领导者、指挥官附魔）- Factions by Massive Craft- FactionsUUID- ASkyBlock: （使用羽翼附魔在空岛飞行）
- MegaSkills- Towny- Legacy Factions
货币类型类型前置描述XP_Level(经验等级)无消耗玩家的经验等级XP_Total(经验)无消耗玩家经验Vault(经济)Vault消耗金钱


指令 & 权限一般来说你只需要给予玩家以下权限：crazyenchantments.tinkercrazyenchantments.blacksmithcrazyenchantments.access（最新开发版该权限为crazyenchantments.gui）CrazyEnchantments.Limit.[附魔数]

指令权限描述/Tinkercrazyenchantments.tinker打开工匠菜单./BlackSmithcrazyenchantments.blacksmith打开铁匠菜单./GKitzcrazyenchantments.access打开套装菜单./GKitz [套装] [玩家]crazyenchantments.gkitz.<套装>打开特定的套装菜单./GKitz Reset <Kit> [玩家]crazyenchantments.reset重置一个玩家的套装冷却./CEcrazyenchantments.access打开附魔菜单./CE Helpcrazyenchantments.access显示所有插件指令./CE Info [附魔名]crazyenchantments.info显示所有附魔的介绍./CE Reloadcrazyenchantments.reload重载配置./CE Remove <附魔名>crazyenchantments.remove移除你手上物品的附魔./CE Add <附魔名> [LvL]crazyenchantments.add给你手上物品添加附魔./CE Spawn <附魔名> [Level:#/World:<世界名>/X:#/Y:#/Z:#]crazyenchantments.spawn在指定的位置生成一本附魔书./CE Scroll <Black/White/Transmog> [数量] [玩家]crazyenchantments.scroll给予一个玩家卷轴./CE Crystal [数量] [玩家]crazyenchantments.crystal给予一个玩家御之水晶./CE Scrambler [数量] [玩家]crazyenchantments.scrambler给予一个玩家命运之骰./CE Dust <Success/Destroy/Mystery> [数量] [玩家] [几率]crazyenchantments.dust给予一个玩家魔法尘埃./CE Book <附魔名> [Lvl] [数量] [玩家]crazyenchantments.book给予一个玩家一本附魔书./CE LostBook <类型> [数量] [玩家]crazyenchantments.lostbook给予一个玩家一本尘封之书.附魔上限CrazyEnchantments.Limit.[附魔数]一个权限组的玩家可给装备附魔的上限


牌子商店用法共有两种类型的牌子商店：附魔类别、黑色卷轴/白色卷轴商店。附魔类别牌子商店 
<Category> 为类别名（common·普通、rare·稀有、legendary·传说）
第一行:{crazyenchant}第二行{类别名}

如下图的第二行为{rare}
 




TIM截图20190731160917.png (20.22 KB, 下载次数: 15)

下载附件

2019-7-31 16:10 上传






卷轴牌子商店 
第一行:{crazyenchant}第二行:{blackscroll}为黑色卷轴，{whitescroll}为白色卷轴
汉化配置该汉化版本基于本人一年前的汉化进行修正，修改了部分附魔名和不通顺的语句完善了大部分注释内容，并且根据强度给部分附魔进行分类部分附魔需要特定的插件，如果未安装这些插件则部分附魔无效，请在Enchantments.yml内手动关闭这些附魔：天使(需kingdom+)指挥官(需kingdom+)领导者(需kingdom+)羽翼(需worldguard或Askyblock)

2019.8.1 更新1.8-1.12的汉化配置，修正部分汉化如果出现乱码请手动转码Windows为ANSILinux为UTF-8



CrazyEnchantments汉化配置.zip
(29.83 KB, 下载次数: 1450, 售价: 5 粒金粒)
